concept.title: Java Command Line Interface
concept.shortdesc: Introduction to using generating documents with Java command line interface

conbody.p: The DITA Open Toolkit provides a Java interface for organizations that automate their document as part of a Java build. However, the Java interface is a wrapper for the Ant interface, so you still must install Ant. In addition, only a subset of the Ant properties are supported by the Java interface.
Three of the Java arguments are required:

dlentry.dd: defines the location of the .ditamap file for your document
This is not a required argumentdefines the director where the output resides after DITA-OT finishes processing your project
